data.message: Eminem you have literally become a trashy washed up fuck boy. I’ll forever listen to your old music from more than a decade ago but you should just die in a fire like this car has. Peace bitch.

replies.message: Considering I didn’t vote for trump your idiotic political ramble makes you look dumb. Apparently you haven’t heard his recent trash song he did with p!nk??? Fucking dumb cunt.

Michael you are one mad bastard but I must say, I wholeheartedly agree with you. None of his shit since recovery was good. Mmlp2 honestly sucks. Rick Rubin ruined the album with those whack ass beats. Can't believe Dre didn't produce every last track on what was supposed to be a sequel to possibly the best rap album ever. Relapse had gopd lyrics except he should have no used that whack accent at all.
